extendedInfo.description: An anonymous, remixable photo app for android.Take a photo > react to it > add text > create! > share it > other people remix it > you remix their remix > lols ensue- AnonymousYarrly is super simple because you don't need to log in. So no pesky passwords, email addresses, Facebook connecting or anything else. It's totally anonymous: the second you open it you can instantly create fun and awesome photo panels.- RemixableYou can share the link to your Yarrlys via email, SMS or any of your existing social networks; Facebook, Reddit, Twitter or anything else you have on your device. Who you share it with determines who will see it. Anyone you share it with can open it in Yarrly then remix it, and you'll get a notification with their reply. Have image conversations with 1 friend or share it with the world to unleash all kinds of remixing craziness. - Photo appTake photos, import from your gallery and make 2 up panels with text. Take a photo, react to it, lols ensue. Can you add fancy pants filters? Na. Yarrly is all about the content not the rose tinted artsy stuff. Why not take a photo of your tasty food and add your happy face. Seen the latest superhero movie? What did you think? Express your lols, wtfs, omgs, rofls and fmls in 2 panel form.It's kind of like a simplified anonymous image board for photos on your android device... capiche?Oh and there is an extraneously piratey interface. ORLY? YARRLY!"Daft ideas, especially with the freedom that a degree of anonymity brings, are sometimes the best" - Steve O'Hear, TechCrunch"Childish nonsense for morons." - GoldenGunner, TechCrunch Commenter"âââââ - Seriously the coolest anonymous photo remixing pirate themed app of all time" - App Jazz Magazine"Best app of the century" - Time Travelling Tech Reviews 2099"...most disruptive thing since sliced bread or that photo filter app thing" - Steve Makebelieve"The android app that nobody asked for but now canât live without" - Smashedable"Yet another thing you are doing instead of getting proper jobs" - our moms

reviews.title: Unique and fun
reviews.comment: To say it\'s like 9gag but better wouldn\'t do it justice. This is a fun easy way for some insta creativity and interaction. Simple ui, good use of device features etc. A totally new and original way to get your meme on!
reviews.author: James Stedman

reviews.title: Beautifully done, great fun
reviews.comment: Great app, well done.
reviews.author: Balazs Balazs

reviews.title: Love it, but..
reviews.comment: It needs some improvements. I think it would be nice to be able to change the font and the color too. And I saw some yarrlys with more than one line of text, how do you do that? I can\'t seem to write over one line of text. I am using galaxy note 2. Thanks :)
reviews.author: Ligar Valentino

reviews.comment: Wonderful
reviews.author: Bharat Kungwani

reviews.title: Potential to be grrreat
reviews.comment: I\'ve been having loads of fun with this app. Essentially a two panel meme remixer. It could do with a \"New Yarrly\" and \"Random Yarrly\" section. Also a lot of users dont seem to get it yet!
reviews.author: Edward M

reviews.title: Fun app
reviews.comment: Pretty funny images so far.
reviews.author: Dennis B

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: I have only been able to make one and it was fun and came out awesome but I haven\'t been able to make a NEW one since. My photos just don\'t upload :( frustrating
reviews.author: Deanna Stewart

reviews.title: Great start.
reviews.comment: Beautiful UI. I\'m not a fan of the two frame restriction though. Most funny comic strips have a minimum of three frames. Add a frame more and I think it\'ll be easier to set up proper punchlines.
reviews.author: Benjamin Byriel

reviews.comment: Awesome app, I\'m totally hooked!
reviews.author: Diarmuid Torney

reviews.title: Brilliant funny app! Arrrr!
reviews.comment: Great way to share funny moments with friends and the world.

reviews.title: 5 starrs
reviews.comment: Because Dave is awesome

reviews.comment: Great app!

reviews.title: Awesomeness
reviews.comment: This is grrrreat fun yarrr

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great, fun app! Simple idea, brilliantly executed.

reviews.comment: OK

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Really awesome app for capturing reactions. I also really like the fact there is so signup process so you can get started straight away.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Probably my favourite photo app out there! great interface and usability. I sense an explosion of creativity coming pretty soon!
reviews.author: Thom Clark

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This app helped me lose my virginity! Granted it was quick, awkward and had had more crying then I\'d hoped, but that\'s more my fault then the app. Great work!
reviews.author: DaVe Lorimer

reviews.title: Minimalist perfection
reviews.comment: What it does, it does with  faultless style. Seriously addictive, but much healthier than crack. I lie awake at night thinking about potential captions, and I think like a pirate. Yarrrr! Please send rum.
reviews.author: Miles Tillinger

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Rated Arrrr!
